rules_text:
[i]Converge[/i] – Create an X/X green and blue Plant creature token, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
Reprise {1}{G} [i](As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)[/i]
